title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen on linen
Technique: satin, surface, buttonhole, drawn and other embroidery stitches on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Strip of white linen embroidered in white linen in design of conventionalized flowers and leaves with scrolls.
